attributes.action: oppose the withdrawal of HMRC from all offices in East Lancashire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HMRC is proposing to keep only a minimal face to face presence in East Lancashire.

They currently propose to close their office in Burnley , following on from the decision to close the office in Accrington and the closure of the office in Nelson.

East Lancashire is an area of social economic deprivation. East Lancashire needs the government to invest in areas such as this, not aid the degeneration by removing some of the better jobs the area has to offer.

Services to the public will suffer as a result. HMRC are committed to maintaining enquiry centres - but, this commitment has so far amounte
to a terraced house with one member of staff in Nelson. The people of  East Lancashire deserve better treatment t
an this!
